name: Temple of Elemental Evil, The
description: This Installer downloads and installs official patch 3
notes:
not needed for GOG version
not suggested because buggy
content:
files:
- patch: ftp://ftp.atari.com/patches/toee/TOEE_ANY-PATCH3.EXE
game:
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- move:
    description: Moving the patch 3
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/TOEE_ANY-PATCH3.EXE
    src: patch
- task:
    description: Running the patch 3
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/TOEE_ANY-PATCH3.EXE
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
requires: temple-of-elemental-evil-the
